title: Login not working
description: User reports that they are unable to login with correct credentials.

title: Payment failed
description: Transaction fails during checkout for multiple users.

title: Profile picture not uploading
description: Users report an error when trying to upload profile images.

title: Email notifications delayed
description: System sends email notifications with significant delay.

title: Cannot reset password
description: Password reset link is not working for some users.

title: App crashes on launch
description: Mobile app crashes immediately after opening on Android 12.

title: Incorrect billing amount
description: Invoices are showing higher amounts than expected.

title: Feature request: Dark mode
description: Client requests adding dark mode support for better accessibility.

title: Unable to export report
description: Export function fails when generating PDF reports over 20 pages.

title: Search functionality broken
description: Search results do not display relevant items for certain keywords.
